segments.text: Excuse me . Can I get a ticket on the next flight to Frankfurt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the fare for a single ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you give me a special offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course.Right now it is the slack season , we will give you ten percent off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about a round trip ? Could you offer us something more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , there is no difference .
segments.speaker: S2
